values: So, i find out about a lie i was being told. Talkin bout hurting sumones feelings. My heart this mornin cracked just one more time than how it was already cracked. lemme just say on myspace, when yer reading sumones blog, it also shows when u signed up with myspace.
Noah and ally. 2 people that had sumthing. a love that never died. Even when the memory was lost by ally. Noah was always there to bring back that memory.

Well i said wut i have to say. ive done a stupid thing. and now im done with lj. im sorry too many memories... its gonna kill me to keep this.  so if u wanna read wtu i got to write, it will be on my space now.   www.myspace.com/minuslink

So, i broke up with ash b/c i thought it would make her happy. well guess wut i was wrong. she was happy, i tried my ass off to work it out. She shot me down left and right. she has all rights to but i think i deserved alittle more than that.
Now i could be like her and sit here and write a journal bout how awful things got but im not going to be like that. its low. its is "scraping the bottom of the barrel." Lemme just say the good times me and ash had are never going to be replaceable. As are the badtimes.   Yes i love her to death and that will not change no matter how many names im called. 

ash, u are a great girl. im a dumb guy for losing you but im atleast im smart enough to not sit on the net and fight with you about the things that have happened and call u all those fucked up names. 


Now we are both left with broken hearts. And trust me my heart still belongs to only one, no matter wut she has to say about me.

http://www.myspace.com/minuslink  



this is where the end is beginning.

Well, i got robbed of 225.00 which isnt much but when u dont have ajob, 225.00 iss a shitload to be losing. I dont wanna get in to details.... lets just say its not gonna be fun to be a "GOTT" in essex.

So me and ashs anniversary is today. i think we are gonna see a movie "larry the cable guy: health inspector" Hopefully today goes by fine.

So lately it feels like ash wants to break up. I dont want it to happen but i cant make her do sumthing she do0esnt want to. i love her more than life but how can i hold her back. i dont kno what to do. i just dont.`

Im going to florida, i was supposed to stay with walt, but walt is comin back up to md while im gonna be in fl. But its gonna be fun. I keep having this feeling that when i come home from florida, im gonna get horrid news. please dont have bad news but i dunno. 

Job searchin has been going ok, not perfect. I really need a job, im gonna apply at my friend chucks job, doing hvac, they train u. I might do it b/c i need a job and i need to start saving money for college. Im looking at about 8years in college and physical therapym programs.

i dont know wut to do. ashley nicole wilson, i love u.

Well, i just got back from lunch with ash. It went ok. I dunno, Just seems like im not enough anymore. I love this girl to death and i ono. I kno she has alot on her mind, i just wish i was part of wuts on her mind. i kno she loves me. i just dont kno wut to do.

Call me mr. insecurity if im that fucking crazy.

wow is the only word i can use to explain wut has happened. Well at work i had a randomdrug test. Lemme just say i failed badly lol.... So i got  a job till wednesday def but thursday no more pawnshop for me. Im just about to get ready for an interview with best buy. I wanna go into Business Professional sales, but who knows.  Well im going back to get ready... wish me luck.. yeah right.

Well yesterday was nice. Me and ash actually got to spend a day together. we went to the gym for alittle bit, then showered. Then we went down to fells pt to visit karmic konnections, i bought a bubbler. its pretty nice. Then we stopped at love craft, bought alittle sumthing. and no, its not a dildo. lol. Then we came to my house to test out the new outfit i bought her. lemme be the first to say, it works.

So im on A no shwag herb diet lol, im only smokin the good stuff. unfortunatly, i smoke too much so doing this will kinda help regulate my smokin. simply the herb costs more, better in quality which untimately will show me smokin less of it b/c i dont have to smoke as much. 

I called about me and ashs vacation, its costs a total of 710.00 for a week in oc but thats good. the 10th og june - the 17th. i got last years rates. i need to send 400.00 down. i got 200 put away  my next check im gonna put the other 200 to it.

Man, i wish yesterday could happen again. <3 ash

Well obviously i dont update much, sorry i work alot. its ok b/c there is like a total of 3 people who even read this. sucks b/c im one of the 3. lol. oh well shit happens. everyone is obsessed with my space, i heard 3 girls got raped b/c of that site.

So i got my friend ryan a job with me. Its going pretty well, makes work alittle easier when u know sumone outside of work too. Not too much has been going on, i tried to get aloan for a car but i was denied. so im just gonna fix this car and hope for the best at another time. this summer im most definatly am moving out. so the car might just have to wait... 

Me and ash celebrated 2 and a half years the other day. We didnt get to do much b/c i had to work. But she did come to lunch with me. So lately it hasnt been too bad it sucks we dont get to see each other and when we do get to see each other we are too tired to do anything. But i got today off and so does she but she might go with her mom to go shopping. part of me thinks that sucks but i kno its good if she goes b/c she needs that kinda time with her mom. Im def cool with it and everything.

So im going on vaction soon, i cant wait. i hate baltimore and well to get away for 6 days is like paradise plus. no work and im getting paid for it. just me and ash in a little place in a nice area.  ahh... cant wait.


wow for once i actually feel like typing all this stuff in and well i just dont kno wutelse to say.

Well me and ash started going to the gym. I have went everyday untill today, i work 9-9 so i dont have time today. Sucks b/c ash works till 10 so its not like we could go tonite. But its ok b/c we are going thursday. so monday  i ended up having off work to try to figure out wuts wrong with my car. Im giving up on it though its not worth the cash.

I dunno wutelse is really new. I hate baltimore and essex. i feel sorry for those esk kids. they are actually proud to come from here. Its such an embarrassment. If i didnt have to spend so much money id be out of here.
I wanna move out soon, but the cash flow is dying down. between this car, and valentines day and everyday food and wutnot. My financial situation should be done after val day. 

Me and ash. well i guess we are doing ok. Not perfect but not bad. 

I heard sumthing the other day that kind of got to me

CUSTOMER: " unless u make 1,500 a week then u make nothing" 
CUSTOMER #2: "i clear bout 2,000 a week"

Wut the hell am i doing wrong? These are the same guys who come into the pawnshop and try to get over on us on cash.

Friends will be friends untill they start to grow.

So last nite me and ash went to see hostile. its was ok, the first hour was like almost every other teenage movie, but afterwards it was real good. very similiar to saw. Overall id give it like a 7 out of 10.

Me and ash went back to her house, pissed at me, she didnt talk to me all the way home. I told her she complains alot and she got mad. 
I dont kno wut im doing so wrong. i cant make that girl happy for anything. ive tried and tried and its just not working. I guess im just gonna have to try harder. Ill find how to sumhow.
i love ash with all of my heart and ill do wut it takes. 

Work has sucked. its boring and i feel like its such a major competition. Moreless people take advantage of u trying to lure in a new customer who will only come to u. People are really fuckin dumb. I wish sum of the people who come to my work go get a real job and make it happen.

i hung out with matt last week, we walked a mile and bullshitted. i feel bad, hes gonna be a dad and hes gettin married. I dont think hes doing all this b/c he loves the girl though.

well im off to work, 9-9 today. ash is comin up to get her $ from me maybe she will stay for lunch. i ono....hopefully.
91103

Im alittle shocked and out of it. i was reading ashs journal and i did her survey and apparently so did sum other people.  

im just alittle hurt right now.
 i almost feel lied to.

So last night me and ash went to get sum tattoos. Ryan came with us... Ash got an outline of a swallow on her foot. It looks really good it will look better when she gets colouring. I got black slashes on my blue tattoo to highlight it. it didnt exactly turn out how i wanted but its looks ok. i might just end up with a black outline and blue inside. The best part is he did all that for 40 bucks each.  so we gave him 60 each for a tip.

Afterwards we went to ihop. lol i spilled tea on ryan lol...foo dwas good. Then me and ash went to her house and watched tv till like 10 she has to be up early today. Shes going shopping.*

ha ha work called me and wanted me to come in last night. no fucking way. 
nope unt uh.

Ashley nicole wilson

Man, im pissed. Work is over doing this now, i like my job but its becoming rediculous. I havent had off since the monday before last. I miss the hell out of ash, and it sucks b/c i cant even see her. If i didnt have a cell phone then i dont think we would have had time to talk as much as we have been. Its fuckin crazy. 

Im saying sumthing to work today, its just nuts. 
id like to update every now and then but i usually have nothing to say. I dont feel like typing about the crackheads who come in my work all day long.  

Yesterday was my neice's bday, couldnt tell u how old she is. i didnt even have time to cal her and say happy bday. Its just nuts. 
So on the 21st me and ash are going to get sum tattoos. im gonna get the taurus symbol in the sun i have on my arm and get it touched up possibly, but i honestly wanna touch my forarm up its looking kinda sloppy right now. From nicks and cuts and shit from work.

So i had a chance to be lp at the parkville homedepot but b/c of my job now, i lost out on that opportunity. Im making this very apparent that this job may have costed me the depot job, but its not costing me ash. 
Ill quit on spot if this starts to interfere with me and ash, a job is not worth it.

I dont kno wut to say, i love ash with all my heart, but it seems that we dont get time to see each other. Im just lucky she is understanding and knows its not me makin this fucked up schedule. She understands that ill be gettin paid good money and she also knows i need the job to make the money i need to get the fuck out of this house. Im not much on religion but thank god im with her, otherwise i dont know wut id be doing.  ok well im off to work.... 


ashley nicole<3

So im about to go to work on a sunday, its ok, its only 6hours. I think me and ash are going to see a movie tonite, but im not sure. the  one she wants to see isnt quite out yet. 

have u ever had this feeling that sumthing is happening? its real hard to explain but it feels very weird lately. It may just be my paranoia kicking in, or maybe not. i dunno, its weird.


well im going to work, ash, i love u and call me when u wake up.<3

Top 10 things that make you happy right now, and tag 5 people to do the same.

1. tonite with ash <3 <3
2. Christmas time
3. bob marley
4. moving out soon
5. No more gas leaks in my house.
6. Nice fat commission checks!
7. Detroit football game on thanksgiving(watchin it with my dad)
8. Weed i wish, fuckin drug test.
9. clean room.
10. last but not least  ash<3

I tag:
x. John
x. Ryan
x. Toni
x. Tascha
x. Adam

Well lately its been fuckin crazy. Things are starting to become difficult and hard. Work has been ok, not great just ok. Ive been working alot lately. I think they are going to fire the new girl. man it seems like we just cant keep people at my work.i ono.. makes it harder on us b/c we got less people but the same amount of customers.

Me and ash:
Well things have been just ok. I never get to see her, i try but its just hard to do it. i wanna see her and spend time with her as much as i can. im starting to get the feeling she doesnt feel the same. i kno she loves me. i kno that much, but can she stand me? i ono...imean she's my life, im absolutly crazy about her, and i adore her so much. I ono maybe its just me.
I feel bad for her tonite, she got another migrain...::sighs:: i wish i knew a cure. i really wish.

It seems like noone ever says anything to me in my journals, not even ash.  
i dunno.. my life just seems...to seem.

So i havent updated for a while again. So i talked to ryan bout gettin a apt with me. Hes into it but he needs time also. It will be cool either to live with sumone or bymyself. Ash would prolly stay over alot lol..hopefully.

Ash has been thinkin more and more about bridgewater, she keeps puttin herself down about it. Then she says stuff like noone supports me going, although im the only person whos been telling her she haves a chance. Kinda made me feel like crap. I mean honestly i believe money will not stop a determined person. Cost of college is crazy but its like that so u will keep in line. All about responsibility*.


Work has been decent lately, for once i dont feel like this job is so dead end. I kno i can save alot of cash up and get out of baltimore moreless essex/dundalk. 

My brother walt is going to florida to work with my other brother dave. hes going for a week. 


I kno that is ash does end up going, i will be sad. But although being sad, id be happy as all hell for her. Shes so smart, if she wants it enough she can go. i kno i will always love her. <3forever.


ashnmike91103

well, i got alittle to say. i finally got a cell phone. its cool i guess. i went with sprint. 
Me and ash went shopping last friday at arundel mills mall, it felt good to see her smile. We spent all weekend together. it was great. We seen the movie stay, which id say in my opinion was a good movie.

So now im bout to go pay my phone bill and i think im gonna buy my car. I dunno. 


i miss ash already<3

i dunno wut it is but october always seems like a waiting period.

So it rained our second weekend down pa.  its ok i got to be with ash. and i got to walk through mud. lol. it s was cool wakin up to the rain and all the animals. it was like.... refreshing.
 So When i came home i got my check for 4,100 bucks. woo hoo.... man it feels like 14 monkeys were lifted from my back.  so tomorrow im gonna go start a bank account. 
im lookin more for savings so i can get started....then maybe checking and all.



er. i hate mood swings.

Well this weekend me and ash are supposed to go campin with her dad and alot of other people. Im hopin everything is good, and it all goes well. i want ash to have a fun time. she seems alittle bored lately. I ono well i think im gonna go pack and then crash....

nite



ash<3

I ono wut it is, i feel so numb. 
i cant explain it.... ash may be leaving and now this guy is hittin on her from her work online. She said on her journal that she didnt want his # bc she had me to talk to but it makes me feel weird that this guy offers it out. Maybe i should go have a talk with this guy. 


i ono wut to do... im scared.

.... i just dont know wut to do.

So me and ash went driving tonite and got lost. it was pretty funny. its was good to see her smiling face. Although it was a great nite, there was a bad part that is hitting me kinda hard. 
See, i love ash to death and well, shes thinkin of college in delaware and she says it will be too hard to stay together. i guess shes right but i cant see myself splitting with her.  its just hard. but im gonna try not to think of it b/c i really wanna enjoy the time me and ash have left. 


<3ash

So its been a real long time since i said anything on here. Not that anyone really even reads this. So its ok. 

Me and ash have been doing pretty good. we dont argue as much anymore. good thing trust me. 
i took out my lobe earrings. i got 2 10g horseshoes in both ear holes. so yes do the math it means 4. lol

i ono if i said anything before, but i got a new cpu. my old one got murdered by a storm. fuckin lightning.
its ok this one is faster. i can burn music now woot. lol

ok im out of here. i got laundry to do. im such a man.

ash<3

so i havent updated in a long time, ive been working my ass off and wutnot. no reason tryin to explained wuts been happenin. i got my arm finished for now it looks pretty good. Work is going good...

me and ash are doing good and things are just lookin up.
  i

ill write more later.

i just dont kno wut to title this.



ash i love u with all my heart<3

so last nite i went after work with ash and her gmom. I got to take this survey on tasting a margarita. it was pretty good, it tasted alot like koolaid with a strong hit of good shit. it was cool then i went to ashs to spend the night. she hurt her back kinda badly, hopefully she gets better soon. 

Tonight im supposed to spend the night again with her, i work 11-9 kinda sucks. 

I kno thi s sounds dumb, but i miss the hell out of ash. i just left her house but wut can i say. i wish she felt the same bout me.



im go nna go smoke a bowl.     play video games...

I have been ok lately. there were sum good times and sum bad times....i think that it was all suppose dto teach me sumthing. 
So, me and ash are together, i got good hopes on things working right, we talked and figured out sum of the problems we were having and so far so great. i ve been trying to relax alittle more, b/c i can flip out in a flash its weird... but im just calmin more now, she said she'd stop leaving me hangin bout wuts really wrong. there was more but i dont wanna get too personal in this. 

the weed thing is going awful, all i can get is mids and blueberry. and it fuckin costs... but it hink tonight, im gettin back to normal.


there is alot more to update but i gotta get ready for work....

Your Birthdate: April 30
Your birthday on the 30th day of the month shows individual self-expression is necessary for your happiness. You tend to have a good way of expressing yourself with words, certainly in a manner that is clear and understandable. You have a good chance of success in fields requiring skill with words. You can be very dramatic in your presentation and you may be a good actor or a natural mimic. You have a vivid imagination that can assist you in becoming a good writer or story-teller. Strong in your opinions, you always tend to think you are on the right side of an issue. There may be a tendency to scatter your energies and have a lot of loose ends in your work. You may have significant artistic talent and be very creative.
What Does Your Birth Date Mean?

So im takin this link out of my profile.  its almost like people cant handle anything, or just leave us the fuck alone.

This stalker shit has to end.



blah blah...




ya kno, its just easier this way.





"the impossible way that i think"-nonpoint

Hmm, where to start.... well me and ash are back together. She came over and we talked and well  ::ta..da:: we're back together.

I got my car radio installed yesterday, god it wasa bitch. today after work im goin to karmic konnections for ash then im goin to circuit city to buy sum speakers.... i kno which ones and wutnot lol... im gonna try to have em by tonight... but i hav eto get new front speakers...

so lately ive been smoking blunts... its weird.  
ash picked up the habit of smoking. that's cool i guess.

not that anyone actually read my journals but it sucks i had to put it as friends only b/c of that fuckin moron... internet battles, next on jerry. Wut a fuckin idiot.  oh well... shit happens.

To be perfectly honest i dont feel like dealing with any drama.... so i kno im not important or anything, im not like a weekly show but my journal is friends only   fuckers lol....

reply to be a friend lol...

Today i went to my car and started messing around with it. i got sum of matts wires, im alittle too depressed to keep doing it.


Sighs. My heart doesnt even beat the same. You could hit me with a truck and i wouldnt feel it.

Me and ash broke up. moreless she dumped me.
Its so hard b/c i still love her.

Wow. i bought a car yesterday.  1990 honda accord. heh... thanks for all the comments people.

It shows that noone really does like me. sighs.



if i wrote sumthing that sounded awfully weird i think id be living world war three.

So me and ash were talking. i felt like crap and decided shes right.  I need to make a drastic change in my life. School. i havent been there in 3 years... maybe its time i fuckin go.

I just dont know wut id like to do.  i was looking at land surveying.. that would proly be kinda fun. get to travel and it might be actually kinda easy... but then again i was looking at oceanagraphy.. the study of the oceans and the "phenomena" i think thats how its spelled. That would be a badass job. B/c in a weird way i kind ahave an obesession with the oceans.(indian ocean in particular.)


So tomorrow im gonna go to ccbc and see wuts up, i wanna see if i can meet with sumone and try to make sense of a dream. I dunno maybe im making a big deal of nothing. but its worth a shot. 

Heh for once. yesterday i didnt smoke weed. Although i did work 12.5 hours. It kinda felt good not to smoke. Its almost like sobriety is the new high. 
Drugs took my life. i let it, rode the ride and enjoyed it so i thought. Can i say that it was prolly the biggest mistake of my life.


Thanks for making me realize it.




 I mean it will be hard between school, work, girlfriend, friends and well time to myself and selling. it will be tough ill admit. But if im half the man i want to be then i can do it. I may need sum support, but im sure sumone will find it in their heart to see with my eyes and realize its a good thing to be alive.



Thanks ash<3.



-------------------------------------
I just dont know. its kinda easy to see wut i want but its hard to get it. ill do wut it takes. Even if it means to sit home and do homework all day.. i just dont want to be like my parents. I cant. I won't. If u dont believe me then id advise u to buy a ticket along with everyone else who doesnt have faith in me, and watch. i will proove anyone wrong who thinks i cant do it.



Thanks again for the inspiration. <3

How come noone else seems to see this my way? im struggling with money badly and its like not one other fuckin person is.  god i hate civilization.

I dunno... sumone out there give me yer thoughts....  lend a voice to this person alone in a box.

Sighs... 
Im not able to get a new car....blows ass. But i ono i think ill be ok. if i lose my car then i guess i lose everything. 

God... is it so hard to have sumone listen?  fuck this im out of here.

OK right now everything feels alittle weird. my net went out last night... my tv went off an hour late... 
i think ash may have overslept or sumthing. well... i ono ive been feeling pretty lonely lately... ash is gonna be hangin out with her cc friends more often and well my friends are like nonexistant at times.

I ono... how does it feel to be alone?

even in my dreams im lonely.

The truth about things.... easily said not so easily told eh. stupid tv thinks he knows everything.

One day everything crashes around u. Next u hold an empire by yer pinky. Unfortunatly i dont hold an empire by my pinky but i feel a shit load better than yesterday. 
Work Wasnt too bad. Alot of people being ass holes. Ya kno  i never seen it this way but when people wanna pawn or sell sumthing they want the highest price and when they go to buy sumthing they want the lowest price... Its true. 

I may be gettin a dodge dakota soon, its jet black... its pretty nice. HOpefully no automatic doors.

So i took ash to dinner last nite, it was ok. i couldnt eat much and she couldnt eat.  she didnt like her appetizer, and dinner. Mine was ok i got fries and this chicken cheese and shrimp thing. it was ok but im not orderin it again.

Sighs.

I just dont know. I hope things go ok with everything.

well, last nite was ok. dee stole from another customer and my dad was ran off the job, and next week my dad will be ok bout it. I dont like living like that. Im glad ash was there when i found out. Shes the ONLY reason i stayed calm. 

So i havent really said much lately.  I finally paid me and ashs 4day vacation off a few weeks ago. That will be cool. im looking forward to that. I think its the being alone with her kinda thing im looking forward to.

I might have to bite the bullet and buy a car from a used car salesman. Luckily ive known him my whole life. I dont wanna do that car payments thing ya kno... but i do wanna choose wut kinda car i get so im gonna do that car payments thing. They are gonna try to clean my a part on my car to see how that goes. But i ono.

Something isnt feeling right. 

------------------------------------
I could write forever. 
-----------------
My shoulder hurts, i think i slept wrong or sumthing. 
-----------------
Can anyone ever see wuts wrong. Does anyone care if im sad or not. I feel low. Like Low of importance. Like i dont matter.

Id like to matter.

----------------
Things just arent the same like when we were young. no cares in the world. 

i hate me.






ash<3 a million times.

The most misunderstood of all the soul signs. Sometimes you even have difficulty seeing yourself as who you are. You are intense and desire perfection in every facet of your life. You're best described as extremely idealistic, hardworking, and a survivor. Great moments of insight and sensitivity come to you easily. But if you aren't careful, you'll ignore these moments and repeat past mistakes. For you, it is difficult to seperate the past from the present.
